title: How it is called or where can I get this connector?
message: The connector is from the mic, the cable and microphone are perfect but the connector is broken.

title: How it is called or where can I get this connector?
message:
I have some of these connectors lying here. You can harvest some of your donor boards.

I set my hot air station as high as it will go and heat the board from the other side. It takes about 40sec for my Aoyue to melt the solder of the other side of the board!

title: How it is called or where can I get this connector?
message:
[QUOTE="Crizz, post: 2233"]I have some of these connectors lying here. You can harvest some of your donor boards.

I set my hot air station as high as it will go and heat the board from the other side. It takes about 40sec for my Aoyue to melt the solder of the other side of the board!
[/QUOTE]

I mean the male one I have a few microphone cables with that problem.
Thank you Crizz for your prompt reply

title: How it is called or where can I get this connector?
message: Why don't you just buy a couple of complete microphones on Ebay, they are like 4$.

title: How it is called or where can I get this connector?

title: How it is called or where can I get this connector?
